hero.title: Dive into the Heart of a
hero.subtitle: Discover the underwater wonders of Las Galeras with our PADI certified multilingual team

about.title: A Unique and Personalized Experience
about.subtitle: Dive from the charming village of Las Galeras, a peaceful haven at the end of the world
about.feature1Text: We are a human-sized center that emphasizes personalized and warm service. Group of 6 divers per boat. Possibility to add a boat to reach 12 divers. We are lucky to have 2 PADI certified Instructors üòâ
about.feature2Text: Benefit from our expertise and perfect knowledge of the most beautiful sites in the region. Dive sites are chosen according to divers' skill levels and weather and maritime conditions.
about.feature3Text: The coral is always alive and above all extraordinarily beautiful! Coral gardens, coral labyrinths, caves, drop-offs, wrecks and the famous Piedra Bonita spot at Cabo Cabr√≥n. Discover turtles, rays, giant barracudas and many other wonders.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: A complete range of services for all levels, from discovery dives to exploration dives

baptism.title: Discovery Dive
baptism.subtitle: From 8 years old
baptism.description: The Adventure Begins Here! Do you dream of exploring a new world? Give yourself your first breath underwater! Safety and Confidence: First gentle and supervised immersion in the pool to familiarize yourself with the equipment if needed.

training.title: PADI Training
training.subtitle: From beginner to expert
training.description: Get your PADI certification with our experienced instructors. From Scuba Diver to Advanced Open Water, we support you in your progression.

funDive.title: Fun Dives
funDive.subtitle: For certified divers
funDive.description: Explore the most beautiful sites of Las Galeras with our day dives. Single or double dive, discover coral gardens, caves, drop-offs and the famous Piedra Bonita.

nightDive.title: Night Dive
nightDive.subtitle: A magical experience
nightDive.description: Discover the magic of nocturnal marine life. A unique experience to observe creatures that only come out at night.

services.ctaTitle: Scuba diving in Las Galeras is a treat!
services.ctaText: You can also encounter turtles, rays, giant barracudas, and many other representatives of the local aquatic fauna.

pricing.title: Our Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Transparent prices for all your underwater adventures
pricing.info1Text: Cash payment (DOP, USD, EUR). Bank transfer possible only for reservation deposits
pricing.info2Text: Reservation deposit required for groups. Contact us!
pricing.info3Text: All necessary equipment, boat transportation, and PADI professional supervision

discovery.name: Discovery Dive
discovery.description: First pool immersion to familiarize with equipment. From 8 years old.

single-dive.name: Single Dive
single-dive.description: One dive exploring the magnificent sites of Las Galeras.

double-dive.name: Double Dive
double-dive.description: Two dives to explore different sites in one day.

night-dive.name: Night Dive
night-dive.description: Discover the magic of nocturnal marine life.

padi-scuba-diver.name: PADI Scuba Diver
padi-scuba-diver.description: PADI certification to dive up to 12 meters with a professional.

open-water.name: Open Water Diver
open-water.description: Complete PADI certification to dive up to 18 meters independently.

advanced-open-water.name: Advanced Open Water
advanced-open-water.description: Advanced PADI level to perfect your skills and dive up to 30 meters.

gallery.title: Photo Gallery
gallery.subtitle: Discover in images the wonders that await you underwater and around Las Galeras

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: What our clients say about their experience with Las Galeras Divers
testimonials.ctaText: Experience an unforgettable diving adventure in Las Galeras

1.name: Marie & Thomas
1.text: An unforgettable experience! The Las Galeras Divers team is incredibly professional and warm. We were able to observe turtles, rays and a multitude of colorful fish. The dive sites are magnificent and well preserved.

2.name: Sophie Laurent
2.text: I did my discovery dive with them and it was perfect! The instructors are very educational and reassuring. I felt safe from start to finish. I highly recommend for a first underwater experience!

3.name: Jean-Pierre Dubois
3.text: As an experienced diver, I was impressed by the quality of the sites and the professionalism of the team. The Piedra Bonita spot is simply extraordinary! Small groups that allow real exploration.

4.name: Moreau Family
4.text: Our 10 and 12 year old children loved their discovery dive! The team was very attentive and patient with them. It became the highlight of our vacation in Las Galeras. Thank you for these memorable moments!

5.name: Couple September 2025
5.text: Great experience with three dives at Las Galeras Divers! First two dives were absolutely magnificent with instructor Jos√©. An experienced diver who knows the area very well! A third dive to accompany my partner doing a discovery dive with C√©dric. Also an experienced, reassuring and pedagogical diver. We highly recommend Las Galeras Divers. Thanks to C√©dric and Cathy for this beautiful experience!
